Text: The Rise of a King [PC PORT]

The Rise of a King is a narrative-driven experience that takes place over a 20-year period leading up to the Battle of Hastings, where the game’s main campaign starts.

Order: 
1. Rebellion in Normandy
2. The Battle of Val-es-Dunes 
3. A Township in Brittany
4. The Siege of Dinan 
5. The Norman Invasion

Note: This is XBOX tutorial campaign port to PC. Feedback and source can be found here https://github.com/search?q=AOE4-RiseOfAKing
